hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to bring his head towards me when he was next door (observing I’tikaf), and I would wash it and comb his hair, when I was in my apartment and I was menstruating, and he was in the mosque.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمُعْتَكِفِ يَغْسِلُ رَأْسَهُ وَيُرَجِّلُهُ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the person observing I`tikaf washing his head and combing his hair
